table.name: vtiger_bhscampaignmanagement
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscampaignmanagement` ( `bhscampaignmanagementid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhscampaignmanagement_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscampaignmanagementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhscampaignmanagementcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscampaignmanagementcf` ( `bhscampaignmanagementid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscampaignmanagementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
